item.title: About me / this website
item.description: About me I am Graduated since 2020 of a Robotics Engineers Diploma, since when i started my professionnal carrier on various subjects linked to Robotics: Robotic Control: Modelization (mobile robotics and robot arms). Direct/Inverse Geometry. Direct/Inverse Kinematics. Direct/Inverse instantaneous Dynamics. Simulation / Softwares ROS/ROS2 Gazebo classic MoveIT Navigation 2 (nav2) OMPL (custom planners) Peter Corke’s Robotics toolbox Catia V5 /Cenit / 3DExperience Professionnal robotics Certifications (Dassault Systems) Certified Robotics - Associate Certified 3DEXPERIENCE Assembly Robot Programmer - Associate Certified 3DEXPERIENCE Fabrication Robot Programmer - Associate 2D/3D perception:
